member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer
member.summary: Represents a panel that displays the navigation options.
member.remarks: NavigationDrawer is a which means it displays the app's main navigation options on the edges of the screen. It is hidden most of the time, but is revealed when the user swipes a finger from the edge of the screen or, while at the top level of the app, the user touches the app icon.
